Title: [ANN] SRG COMMUNITY - THE FIRST CRYPTO LOYALTY PROGRAM FOR ONLINE GAMING 🎮
Body: Dear all, the BC spreadsheets are finally completed and updated. In case you are not a telegram bounty chat member yet, please join our group @ https://t.me/srg_bounty   Warning 1:    Since the Creative Support Bounty contains very small number of approved members, it was decided that these participants will be added to Blogging bounty and both Creative campaign  pool and Blogging campaign pool will be merged into one total pool. Because of that now it's not 20% but 30% is allocated to Blogging section.  Warning 2:   Bounty pool will be accessible in case the soft cap is reached. All payments will be distributed in terms of December results =  the token number sold during online funds raising procedure.  ! Remember that the results are final and are NOT the subject of discussion.   _____________________________________  Facebook:  https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/16nKGU8phyShxqCM2AhimtxEPfYBvyR-SH9jv_xT_yfY/edit?usp=sharing  Twitter:   https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1QQ9hc5Q2R3zoczrFSo5YFXSr9YLuVC8p8TCbkZ-BmaI/edit?usp=sharing  Signature:     https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1mCNfkrMSzGcVIQ-2eK5EUms2XixcoPiOS2gAJLR1-TI/edit?usp=sharing  BTT Thread Support:   https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1KgC9Ev8v4vYE0X9SCwbiIj3anPxzvnFOQV9h1n12OII/edit?usp=sharing  Blogging bounty:   https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1R66BOymamMl5loq2NWIYemWkLDCJNWmVvhX1U0eOYDs/edit?usp=sharing  Creative bounty:   https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1LxU7vE1XTYbkdvVI-euiFlPi0STZF0qPIg0miW_noIA/edit?usp=sharing  All infos regarding token distribution are attached in the pinned message. Author: santygo777
Title: [ANN] SRG COMMUNITY - THE FIRST CRYPTO LOYALTY PROGRAM FOR ONLINE GAMING 🎮
Body: Information on the situation with Fahi Hamzah  Let's clarify the meanings of definitions:  Who is an Adviser? Adviser - it's the person who gives some consult and explications in the domain of his activity and knowledge. Let's define some terminology what is a SCAM? In our understanding a SCAM is - fraud, cheat, deception.  Let's see what is happening with the project SRG Community: 1. One of the our Public Adviser don’t give confirmation of his participation in the project; 2. meanwhile other Public Advisors are accessible; 3. the team of the project is real; 4. regardless of the ICO, the SRG Platform (that is the essential of SRG Community Project) is moving in his way of development and enhancement; 5. SRG is now in the process of coordination of integration to the one active existing platform for online games; 6. getting by the project SRG Community the highest ratings: ICO Rating, ICO Banch, ICO Review; 7. one of the banks is Escrow agent of SRG Project; 8. we are in the process of registration of SRG trade mark (class 9,35) in the foreign countries EU, India, South Korea, Japan, Singapore, China, Thailand, Indonesia, Russia.   A valuing all this facts it's to you to come to a decision is SCAM or real?  Regarding the situation with our Public Adviser Mr. Fahri Hamzah: through September, 2017, we have had consultations with him using the representative of the Embassy of Indonesia in Russia - Raymond Junior Pardamean. Afterwards we asked Mr. Fahri Hamzah using the same representative of the Embassy to be our Public Adviser by posting information about him on our website - srg.io. We've received from Raymond Junior Pardamean the confirmation and information about Mr. Fahri Hamzah.  On the 21st of November 2017 a screenshot from the personal account of Mr. Fahri Hamzah was posted in our telegrams channel. Where was a question about his participation in our project as an Adviser and where was not given any positive or negative response regarding.  On the 22nd of November 2017 we sent the e-mail to Mr. Fahri Hamzah -  asking if he can confirm his Advising of the project SRG Community.    Still now we have not received any response from Mr. Fahri Hamzah. Also nobody contact us to remove information about his participation.  Considering the political status of Mr. Fahri Hamzah we allow that some situations can create the change of his previous decision to be a Public Advisor in external commercial project.  But the post from the Twitter account Mr. Fahri Hamzah was deleted...

Author: santygo777
Title: [ANN] SRG COMMUNITY - THE FIRST CRYPTO LOYALTY PROGRAM FOR ONLINE GAMING 🎮
Body: First of all, let's start with conceptual differences. Gathering a single community of players is the common goal of any online project related to the gaming industry, be it Gamecredits, Skincoin or Okcash. But the way to achieve the goal of each project is different. For example, MobileGo wants to build its own playmarket, Skincoin creates a platform for selling and sharing skins. Our team realizes the goal through the monetization of viral marketing, which has repeatedly proved its effectiveness. We create a decentralized loyalty program, introducing our system into online games.

Author: santygo777
Title: [ANN] SRG COMMUNITY - THE FIRST CRYPTO LOYALTY PROGRAM FOR ONLINE GAMING 🎮
Body: Orderbook is a protected platform, it is also a stock exchange, the wallet on it is exclusively yours, and not like on other exchanges. Withdraw from the Orders will be possible on any ERC20 wallet immediately after the ICO. The beauty of the Orender is that it's your personal wallet, not your internal address on the stock exchange. Therefore, any tokens with dividends, lying on the warrant book without any problems receive dividends.

Author: santygo777
Title: [ANN] SRG COMMUNITY - THE FIRST CRYPTO LOYALTY PROGRAM FOR ONLINE GAMING 🎮
Body: SRG token is an investment token that is sold exclusively during the ICO period of the company and entitles the owner of the token to receive a share of the profits from the SRG community. GMP is a token that is released exclusively by the incoming financial stream, which serves to reward partners in the SRG community system. After the ICO is over, we will issue a GMP token, and everyone will be able to use the GMP functionality on the SRG community platform or exchange on the exchange. On our part, instructions and the release date will be provided.

Author: santygo777
Title: [ANN] SRG COMMUNITY - THE FIRST CRYPTO LOYALTY PROGRAM FOR ONLINE GAMING 🎮
Body: At an early stage, immediately after the end of the ICO, our tokens will be placed on Orderbook.io and Coinsbank.com.

Our module is free and integrated into the developers' application 3) a motivated flow of players. Our loyalty program will launch viral marketing in any gaming project, so there will be a natural attraction of users

Title: [ANN] SRG COMMUNITY - THE FIRST CRYPTO LOYALTY PROGRAM FOR ONLINE GAMING 🎮
Body: In a smartcontract you can see a lot of useful information. Which often can be kept silent by unscrupulous developers. For example: - you can check what the exact emission of tokens is - is there any hidden premine - is there a mechanism for burning tokens - is there any frozen amount and to what point it will remain so. And much more. Find and read manual about ethereum smartcontracts, there are lot of information in web.

Author: santygo777
Title: [ANN] SRG COMMUNITY - THE FIRST CRYPTO LOYALTY PROGRAM FOR ONLINE GAMING 🎮
Body: First of all, let's start with conceptual differences. Gathering a single community of players is the common goal of any online project related to the gaming industry, be it Gamecredits, Skincoin or Okcash. But the way to achieve the goal of each project is different. For example, MobileGo wants to build its own playmarket, Skincoin creates a platform for selling and sharing skins. Our team realizes the goal through the monetization of viral marketing, which has repeatedly proved its effectiveness. We create a decentralized loyalty program, introducing our system into online games.

Author: santygo777
Title: [ANN] SRG COMMUNITY - THE FIRST CRYPTO LOYALTY PROGRAM FOR ONLINE GAMING 🎮
Body: SRG token is an investment token that is sold exclusively during the ICO period of the company and entitles the owner of the token to receive a share of the profits from the SRG community. GMP is a token that is released exclusively by the incoming financial stream, which serves to reward partners in the SRG community system. After the ICO is over, we will issue a GMP token, and everyone will be able to use the GMP functionality on the SRG community platform or exchange on the exchange. On our part, instructions and the release date will be provided.  The exchanges are: orderbook and coinsbank.

Title: [ANN] SRG COMMUNITY - THE FIRST CRYPTO LOYALTY PROGRAM FOR ONLINE GAMING 🎮
Body: As you know, now we have the ability to accept EURO legally as payment to account of the SRG community and everyone can buy SRG tokens for Fiat currency using just a credit card.  Here is the instruction:  To invest in EURO and following the procedure KYC/AML and also to avoid misunderstandings and difficulties, you have to do the following:  1. Fill the form relevant to your category of KYC/AML (Form 1 / Form 2) 2. Make a transfer according to the details of the SRG community. 3. Send the common letter to our email info@srg.io with the following scanned documents: marked (Documents EURO)  All forms, list of the necessary documents and more information you can find here - https://goo.gl/pM69c2  We appreciate your trust and the safety of your assets. After filling and sending documents, you will pass the verification procedure ‘KYC/AML‘ and become full owner of SRG tokens assigned to your account. Thank you for joining SRG Community!  Support: info@srg.io

Author: santygo777
Title: [ANN] SRG COMMUNITY - THE FIRST CRYPTO LOYALTY PROGRAM FOR ONLINE GAMING 🎮
Body: GMP-tokens are issued exclusively in exchange for the currency entering the SRG system. For every 10$ - 100 tokens are issued. With GMP you can make in-game purchases in all games included in the SRG system. Also, this type of token can be converted into Ethereum tokens, which any participant can withdraw to his wallet that supports this type of payment. The purse address will need to be specified in the personal account in the SRG system. Then, specify how many GMP tokens you want to exchange. After this, the referent receives an equivalent amount in ETH-tokens. Moreover, all referees have the opportunity to trade tokens on stock exchanges.  This type of operation is also convenient for game developers participating in the SRG system as they always have access to reports on all payments made by referrals.

Title: [ANN] SRG COMMUNITY - THE FIRST CRYPTO LOYALTY PROGRAM FOR ONLINE GAMING 🎮
Body: SRG token is an investment token that is sold exclusively during the ICO period of the company and entitles the owner of the token to receive a share of the profits from the SRG community. GMP is a token that is released exclusively by the incoming financial stream, which serves to reward partners in the SRG community system. After the ICO is over, we will issue a GMP token, and everyone will be able to use the GMP functionality on the SRG community platform or exchange on the exchange. On our part, instructions and the release date will be provided.  The exchanges are: orderbook and coinsbank.

This unique event took place in Yekaterinburg on the 18th of October - the first battle in the financial history of Russia between the representatives of traditional markets and cryptocurrencies, organized by the RTS. Each team was represented by three men, and the fight consisted of three rounds of eight minutes.  The organizers hope that this event wasn’t the last and plan to make live video of future battles.

Author: santygo777
Title: [ANN] SRG COMMUNITY - THE FIRST CRYPTO LOYALTY PROGRAM FOR ONLINE GAMING 🎮
Body: On the 17th October in Yekaterinburg the Blockchain Day has been organized by CryptoStudents, community unit Gamity, with the support of Cryptania. This meetup was about the blockchain in its different manifestations.  The purpose of this event was to inform people, who are not familiar with the concept of the blockchain, about this platform and, moreover,  informed participants had something to argue about.  The project for gamers SRG based on the principle “play and earn” has been represented by Dmitry Lagutin. The speakers and the audience found this project rather cool due to the fact that you need to show your social activity in gaming and get a reward for it.  Each speaker has explained what blockchain is and what to expect from it, why it’s prospective.  Our chat where you can discuss it: https://t.me/srgcommunityen

Author: santygo777
Title: [ANN] SRG COMMUNITY - THE FIRST CRYPTO LOYALTY PROGRAM FOR ONLINE GAMING 🎮
Body: We have 2 types of tokens.  - The SRG token is a token issued exclusively during the ICO period, which entitles you to receive a share of SRG’s profits every six months. The price of one token will be 2 USD. And total amount of them - 20 000 000. Also you can buy SRG tokens for such cryptocurrency as ETH,BTS and ShapeShift. All tokens (100%), sold and distributed during the ICO, are provided by 50% of the company’s profits. SRG token sale starts on the 4th of October in 2017. At the end of the ICO period, the SRG tokens will be traded on the cryptocurrency exchanges. Tokens which won’t be sold during the ICO will be burnt immediately after the ICO.  Every six months, after ending of the Eco period, SRG will allocate 50% of the profit for the payment of rewards to the token holders. As the SRG token is a profit share, its value for the token holders directly depends on the profitability of the SRG Community.  Our strategic goal is to connect a large number of games to the SRG system, to promote the community and build up the client base. Therefore, we will ensure a stable growth of the company’s profits and an increase of the volume of payments to the token holders every half-year. That will lead to increased demand for SRG tokens because the profitability of this token for holders will outstrip its competitors.   - GMP-tokens are issued exclusively in exchange for the currency entering the SRG system. For every 10$ - 100 tokens are issued. With GMP you can make in-game purchases in all games included in the SRG system. Also, this type of token can be converted into Ethereum tokens, which any participant can withdraw to his wallet that supports this type of payment. The purse address will need to be specified in the personal account in the SRG system. Then, specify how many GMP tokens you want to exchange. After this, the referent receives an equivalent amount in ETH-tokens. Moreover, all referees have the opportunity to trade tokens on stock exchanges.  This type of operation is also convenient for game developers participating in the SRG system as they always have access to reports on all payments made by referrals.

Author: santygo777
Title: [ANN] SRG COMMUNITY - THE FIRST CRYPTO LOYALTY PROGRAM FOR ONLINE GAMING 🎮
Body: We do not claim that all players will cooperate with us, we believe that a conversion of at least 5% will be interesting to earn real money, since our target referrer will be users in the age group of 12-20 years. Typically at this age, young people are looking for opportunities to earn pocket money, and with our help you can not just make pocket money, but also build a successful business.  We have developed a marketing strategy and a system of continuous quest training for project partners. Also, promotional materials have been developed that will help in building a client network. In particular: video clips, banners and specialized materials to explain the concept of the project.  System of work with small groups: 1. There is a motivation to stay in the game, because of friends are there 2. There is competition 3. There is no sense to leaving the project, as a community of friends was forned in one project  As a result, the player stays in the game, as a motivated gaming community is formed

Author: potizuh
Title: [ANN] SRG COMMUNITY - THE FIRST CRYPTO LOYALTY PROGRAM FOR ONLINE GAMING 🎮
Body: Global Jobcoin, world’s first cryptocurrency for employment services, raised more than $7 Million in just a few days after announcing its presale. Powered by successful Swiss international Job Platforms Jobstoday.ch; Jobstoday.de; Jobstoday.at; Jobstoday.pl, Global Jobcoin ICO has become very popular among cryptocurrency investors & enthusiast within a few days.  It is not a surprise since Global Jobcoin ICO is backed by an established & successful company. The Job platforms are already in the market since last 3 years & have already more than 5000 clients & 1 Million + users registered on their platforms.  On the market, there are many ICOs being announced daily but most of them don’t even have any company structure, no product, no prototype or the team has no experience in product & business development. Global Jobcoin ICO has ticked all the boxes for a successful ICO. It is apparent from the presale & extremely high interest in the crowd sale. Independent ICO rating agency ICObench.com has rated Global Jobcoin 4.7 from 5.  “The fact that any investor can check that we exist since 2014 & have a working successful product in Switzerland, Germany, Austria & Poland, gives them confidence that their investment is safe with us”, said Sanket Deshmukh, Co-founder & CEO of Jobstoday & Global Jobcoin. He further added, “We receive daily at least 100 mails from our potential investors who like our ICO & are pleased to invest in it. Today’s ICO investors are smart, intelligent & they see the potential in ICOs with working product. Distribution of tokens is very important factor in deciding about the ICO. Global Jobcoin founders only hold 10% of total tokens, so the manipulation of the price is not possible. Lots of ICOs are keeping a lot of tokens for themselves so that they can manipulate the price. We have been very transparent with our investors from the beginning & that makes a big difference. Besides that, we will only have a circulating supply of 70 Million tokens & we will also invest 10% of our global profits in buying back Global Jobcoin tokens from the market.”  “Cryptocurrency investors are pushing the technology to its next level. ICOs are here to stay & the ones with successful products will give the investors a good return in short or long term”, said Lukasz Ochnik, Co-founder & CTO of Jobstoday & Global Jobcoin. He further added, “We hear about various scam ICOs daily, I personally never invested in any ICO which doesn’t have a legal company structure, experienced team & at least a prototype. Another important factor is whether the company address is revealed on the website & they can be found in company registration directory of that country. I don’t understand how people should invest in an ICO if the company does not even want to reveal its address. We spent 2 months in planning the ICO with our great team. We looked at various factors & how we can guarantee our investors the return that we promise. Our token holders not only benefit from our rising token price but also from the 20% dividends that they receive from our worldwide profits.”  The Global Jobcoin presale is currently in progress & minimum investment of 10 ETH is accepted, tokens are guaranteed through a SAFT agreement during the presale. The public crowd sale will start on October 28. The hard cap is set at 200,000 ETH, which is approximately $60 Million.  About Global Jobcoin  Global Jobcoin is an ERC20 decentralized token to pay for services related to employment. Using the Ethereum blockchain, this token is created for employers & employees worldwide. Global Jobcoin will be used on all Job platforms of Jobstoday in Switzerland, Germany, Austria & Poland. As the company expands its operations worldwide, Global Jobcoin will become the essential choice of payment on all the platforms around the world. Jobstoday is also collaborating with other partner Job boards to offer integration of Global Jobcoin into their platforms. Global Jobcoin & Jobstoday Platforms are products of Sunny Look Media LLC, registered Swiss company since 2014 in Wollerau, Canton of Schwyz.  Jobstoday Management  Sanket Deshmukh is the Co-Founder & CEO of Jobstoday & Global Jobcoin. Sanket brings 20 years of experience in Software & Business Development. Over the last 3 years, he has co-founded & built a successful multinational & multilingual recruitment platform in Switzerland Germany, Austria & Poland. His prompt, competent, & solution oriented customer skills have been received very positively by the customers.  Lukasz Ochnik is the Co-Founder & CTO of Jobstoday & Global Jobcoin. Lukasz brings over 15 years of experience in Software Development & Digital Marketing. As a co-founder & technology lead, he has always pushed the limits & implemented new innovative features on the platform. His efforts have always benefited the clients to reduce costs & save time. His ability to find perfect solutions has made him very popular among the clients.  Website: https://www.globaljobcoin.com Global Jobcoin Presale Information Start date: 22.09.2017 – 15:00 UTC Total Tokens available in Presale: 10,000,000 (10 Million) Tokens remaining for purchase in Presale: 3,000,000 (3 Million) Presale Bonus: 50-60% Bonus Token exchange rate: 1 ETH = 560 GJC (60% Bonus) Token Price: 0.53 USD Token exchange rate: 1 ETH = 525 GJC (50% Bonus) Token Price: 0.57 USD  Presale Conditions  Minimum purchase: 10 ETH (3000 USD) Maximum transaction amount: Unlimited Amount of tokens per one person: Unlimited Currencies accepted: Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Ripple (XRP), Litecoin (LTC)  Tokens purchased during pre-sale will be issued during the crowd sale. Presale tokens are guaranteed with SAFT agreement.

Author: santygo777
Title: [ANN] SRG COMMUNITY - THE FIRST CRYPTO LOYALTY PROGRAM FOR ONLINE GAMING 🎮
Body: First of all, let's start with conceptual differences. Gathering a single community of players is the common goal of any online project related to the gaming industry, be it Gamecredits, Skincoin or Okcash. But the way to achieve the goal of each project is different. For example, MobileGo wants to build its own playmarket, Skincoin creates a platform for selling and sharing skins. Our team realizes the goal through the monetization of viral marketing, which has repeatedly proved its effectiveness. We create a decentralized loyalty program, introducing our system into online games.

Author: santygo777
Title: [ANN] SRG COMMUNITY - THE FIRST CRYPTO LOYALTY PROGRAM FOR ONLINE GAMING 🎮
Body: GMP-tokens are issued exclusively in exchange for the currency entering the SRG system. For every 10$ - 100 tokens are issued. With GMP you can make in-game purchases in all games included in the SRG system. Also, this type of token can be converted into Ethereum tokens, which any participant can withdraw to his wallet that supports this type of payment. The purse address will need to be specified in the personal account in the SRG system. Then, specify how many GMP tokens you want to exchange. After this, the referent receives an equivalent amount in ETH-tokens. Moreover, all referees have the opportunity to trade tokens on stock exchanges.  This type of operation is also convenient for game developers participating in the SRG system as they always have access to reports on all payments made by referrals.

Author: santygo777
Title: [ANN] SRG COMMUNITY - THE FIRST CRYPTO LOYALTY PROGRAM FOR ONLINE GAMING 🎮
Body: We have 2 types of tokens.  - The SRG token is a token issued exclusively during the ICO period, which entitles you to receive a share of SRG’s profits every six months. The price of one token will be 2 USD. And total amount of them - 20 000 000. Also you can buy SRG tokens for such cryptocurrency as ETH,BTS and ShapeShift. All tokens (100%), sold and distributed during the ICO, are provided by 50% of the company’s profits. SRG token sale starts on the 4th of October in 2017. At the end of the ICO period, the SRG tokens will be traded on the cryptocurrency exchanges. Tokens which won’t be sold during the ICO will be burnt immediately after the ICO.  Every six months, after ending of the Eco period, SRG will allocate 50% of the profit for the payment of rewards to the token holders. As the SRG token is a profit share, its value for the token holders directly depends on the profitability of the SRG Community.  Our strategic goal is to connect a large number of games to the SRG system, to promote the community and build up the client base. Therefore, we will ensure a stable growth of the company’s profits and an increase of the volume of payments to the token holders every half-year. That will lead to increased demand for SRG tokens because the profitability of this token for holders will outstrip its competitors.   - GMP-tokens are issued exclusively in exchange for the currency entering the SRG system. For every 10$ - 100 tokens are issued. With GMP you can make in-game purchases in all games included in the SRG system. Also, this type of token can be converted into Ethereum tokens, which any participant can withdraw to his wallet that supports this type of payment. The purse address will need to be specified in the personal account in the SRG system. Then, specify how many GMP tokens you want to exchange. After this, the referent receives an equivalent amount in ETH-tokens. Moreover, all referees have the opportunity to trade tokens on stock exchanges.  This type of operation is also convenient for game developers participating in the SRG system as they always have access to reports on all payments made by referrals.

Author: santygo777
Title: [ANN] SRG COMMUNITY - THE FIRST CRYPTO LOYALTY PROGRAM FOR ONLINE GAMING 🎮
Body: At an early stage we will trade on these exchanges Coinsbank, Orderbook and Tidex.  We have 2 types of tokens.  - The SRG token is a token issued exclusively during the ICO period, which entitles you to receive a share of SRG’s profits every six months. The price of one token will be 2 USD. And total amount of them - 20 000 000. Also you can buy SRG tokens for such cryptocurrency as ETH,BTS and ShapeShift. All tokens (100%), sold and distributed during the ICO, are provided by 50% of the company’s profits. SRG token sale starts on the 4th of October in 2017. At the end of the ICO period, the SRG tokens will be traded on the cryptocurrency exchanges. Tokens which won’t be sold during the ICO will be burnt immediately after the ICO.  Every six months, after ending of the Eco period, SRG will allocate 50% of the profit for the payment of rewards to the token holders. As the SRG token is a profit share, its value for the token holders directly depends on the profitability of the SRG Community.  Our strategic goal is to connect a large number of games to the SRG system, to promote the community and build up the client base. Therefore, we will ensure a stable growth of the company’s profits and an increase of the volume of payments to the token holders every half-year. That will lead to increased demand for SRG tokens because the profitability of this token for holders will outstrip its competitors.   - GMP-tokens are issued exclusively in exchange for the currency entering the SRG system. For every 10$ - 100 tokens are issued. With GMP you can make in-game purchases in all games included in the SRG system. Also, this type of token can be converted into Ethereum tokens, which any participant can withdraw to his wallet that supports this type of payment. The purse address will need to be specified in the personal account in the SRG system. Then, specify how many GMP tokens you want to exchange. After this, the referent receives an equivalent amount in ETH-tokens. Moreover, all referees have the opportunity to trade tokens on stock exchanges.  This type of operation is also convenient for game developers participating in the SRG system as they always have access to reports on all payments made by referrals.

Author: santygo777
Title: [ANN] SRG COMMUNITY - THE FIRST CRYPTO LOYALTY PROGRAM FOR ONLINE GAMING 🎮
Body: The more people are connected to the SRG community, the more turnover of in-game tokens, which means the company's revenue growth, which directly affects the profit of the token to be paid to the holders.

All tokens (100%), sold and distributed during the ICO, are provided by 50% of the company’s profits. SRG token sale starts on the 4th of October in 2017. At the end of the ICO period, the SRG tokens will be traded on the cryptocurrency exchanges. Tokens which won’t be sold during the ICO will be burnt immediately after the ICO.  Every six months, after ending of the Eco period, SRG will allocate 50% of the profit for the payment of rewards to the token holders. As the SRG token is a profit share, its value for the token holders directly depends on the profitability of the SRG Community.  Our strategic goal is to connect a large number of games to the SRG system, to promote the community and build up the client base. Therefore, we will ensure a stable growth of the company’s profits and an increase of the volume of payments to the token holders every half-year. That will lead to increased demand for SRG tokens because the profitability of this token for holders will outstrip its competitors.   - GMP-tokens are issued exclusively in exchange for the currency entering the SRG system. For every 10$ - 100 tokens are issued. With GMP you can make in-game purchases in all games included in the SRG system. Also, this type of token can be converted into Ethereum tokens, which any participant can withdraw to his wallet that supports this type of payment. The purse address will need to be specified in the personal account in the SRG system. Then, specify how many GMP tokens you want to exchange. After this, the referent receives an equivalent amount in ETH-tokens. Moreover, all referees have the opportunity to trade tokens on stock exchanges.  This type of operation is also convenient for game developers participating in the SRG system as they always have access to reports on all payments made by referrals.

Title: [ANN] SRG COMMUNITY - THE FIRST CRYPTO LOYALTY PROGRAM FOR ONLINE GAMING 🎮
Body: We do not claim that all players will cooperate with us, we believe that a conversion of at least 5% will be interesting to earn real money, since our target referrer will be users in the age group of 12-20 years. Typically at this age, young people are looking for opportunities to earn pocket money, and with our help you can not just make pocket money, but also build a successful business.  We have developed a marketing strategy and a system of continuous quest training for project partners. Also, promotional materials have been developed that will help in building a client network. In particular: video clips, banners and specialized materials to explain the concept of the project.  System of work with small groups: 1. There is a motivation to stay in the game, because of friends are there 2. There is competition 3. There is no sense to leaving the project, as a community of friends was forned in one project  As a result, the player stays in the game, as a motivated gaming community is formed

Author: santygo777
Title: [ANN] SRG COMMUNITY - THE FIRST CRYPTO LOYALTY PROGRAM FOR ONLINE GAMING 🎮
Body: Key Features of the Project.  Advantages for players:  - Creating one’s own business. By becoming a partner of the SRG Community, the player has the opportunity to build his or her own business based on the loyalty program. The motivation system will enable the creation of a deep client network and give the partner a high level of income. At the same time, the partner will have all the tools (from banners to video clips) for eectively promoting the referral link and building a referral network. This is really the first real opportunity to play a game and run a business at the same time.  - Since we are in direct contact with the game developers, the participants of the SRG system have the opportunity to purchase a premium currency in any game project, which comes with a 30–40% discount in partnership with SRG. Game bonuses. Gifts and premium services from game developers, dependent on partnership. Bonuses will be granted not only to the referrers, but also to the people referred. Once a quarter, the most active referrer will receive additional valuable prizes, which will also increase the interest in participating in the SRG system and add a competitive spirit.  Advantages for game developers:  - Generation of targeted trafic. Since SRG is a point-based CPA network in the online gaming world, we will be able to attract targeted players through referral programs, thus completely eliminating the possibility of bots or low-quality trafic appearing. We know that our referrers are interested in acquiring income and additional rewards that can only come from a targeted and high-quality flow of referrals.  - Budget savings. Thanks to the cooperation with SRG, game developers will reduce the costs of their advertising campaigns, since the SRG module is free and integrated with the developer’s application. In the case of a partnership, the developer will pay commissions from trafic coming through the SRG referral program. The commission is 30–50% of each player’s purchase, which will go to marketing and rewards for the token holders. Ultimately, we are switching to a system in which the developer first receives a target payment from the player (for example, through the App Store), and only then pays for this purchase commissions, thereby saving his budget.  - Stream of motivated players. With the SRG loyalty program, we will be able to launch viral marketing in any gaming project to attract a stream of motivated customers with the help of the original players in the project. There is also a natural increase in the number of users due to the players of other games who are connected to the SRG platform.

Author: Dominika_Koks
Title: [ANN] SRG COMMUNITY - THE FIRST CRYPTO LOYALTY PROGRAM FOR ONLINE GAMING 🎮
Body: We have 2 types of tokens. Some more information about one of them.  GMP-tokens are issued exclusively in exchange for the currency entering the SRG system. For every 10$ - 100 tokens are issued. With GMP you can make in-game purchases in all games included in the SRG system. Also, this type of token can be converted into Ethereum tokens, which any participant can withdraw to his wallet that supports this type of payment. The purse address will need to be specified in the personal account in the SRG system. Then, specify how many GMP tokens you want to exchange. After this, the referent receives an equivalent amount in ETH-tokens. Moreover, all referees have the opportunity to trade tokens on stock exchanges.  This type of operation is also convenient for game developers participating in the SRG system as they always have access to reports on all payments made by referrals.

Author: Dominika_Koks
Title: [ANN] SRG COMMUNITY - THE FIRST CRYPTO LOYALTY PROGRAM FOR ONLINE GAMING 🎮
Body: As you know our SRG system has 2 types of tokens. Here you can find useful information about one of them, SRG-token. The information about another token is above.  The SRG token is a token issued exclusively during the ICO period, which entitles you to receive a share of SRG’s profits every six months. The price of one token will be 2 USD. And total amount of them - 20 000 000. Also you can buy SRG tokens for such cryptocurrency as ETH,BTS and ShapeShift. All tokens (100%), sold and distributed during the ICO, are provided by 50% of the company’s profits. SRG token sale starts on the 4th of October in 2017. At the end of the ICO period, the SRG tokens will be traded on the cryptocurrency exchanges. Tokens which won’t be sold during the ICO will be burnt immediately after the ICO.  Every six months, after ending of the Eco period, SRG will allocate 50% of the profit for the payment of rewards to the token holders. As the SRG token is a profit share, its value for the token holders directly depends on the profitability of the SRG Community.  Our strategic goal is to connect a large number of games to the SRG system, to promote the community and build up the client base. Therefore, we will ensure a stable growth of the company’s profits and an increase of the volume of payments to the token holders every half-year. That will lead to increased demand for SRG tokens because the profitability of this token for holders will outstrip its competitors.

Author: Dominika_Koks
Title: [ANN] SRG COMMUNITY - THE FIRST CRYPTO LOYALTY PROGRAM FOR ONLINE GAMING 🎮
Body: Our system will be actively developed in all countries where mobile and computer games are popular. However, we chose the Asian market as a priority. We do that for several reasons:  1. Number of installations China has the largest number of users. The top application on the iPhone there gets 350,000 installations per day. The largest revenue in Japan is 1 million USD per day on the iPhone with 77,000 installations and 1.5 million USD on Android with 53,000 installations.  2. Amount of money and active assets spent on online games Users from East Asia (China, Japan, and South Korea) spent 12.7 billion USD on mobile games in 2016. The sum of investments is led by Japan: 132 million people spent 6.2 billion USD, which is more than in the US, the publication notes. The largest number of users of mobile games in Asia is in China — 785 million people. They spent 5.2 billion USD on games on iOS and Android in 2016. South Korea rounds off the “big three” with expenditures of 1.3 billion USD. Positive attitude to cryptocurrency and development of the blockchain. The Japanese authorities adopted a law on virtual currency this April. Thanks to the new law, the country has now legalized Bitcoin and Ethereum cryptocurrencies. Thus, the cryptocurrency in Japan can now be used for mutual settlements. China and Korea are going to do the same.  3. The average daily time spent on online games is 5 hours The governments of the Asian countries have recognized the problem of over-enthusiasm for computer and mobile games, which is increasing every year. More and more young people prefer computer and mobile games to online entertainment and personal meetings with friends.

Therefore, we will ensure a stable growth of the company’s profits and consequently an increase in the volume of payments to the token holders from half-year to half-year. Title: [ANN] SRG COMMUNITY - THE FIRST CRYPTO LOYALTY PROGRAM FOR ONLINE GAMING 🎮
Body: Almir Salimov about Crypto Bazar  Almir Salimov is the head of IT projects. He was present at the second event of Crypto Bazar, which was held in Moscow on the 21th ofSeptember. Its organizer is a well-known company InvestBazar.  During the event such topics as the regulation of the ICO, ICO for physical assets and what os the difference between Blockchain projects and other projects of ICO were discussed. Also, there was Speed Dating with investors that didn't impress Almir, as none of the investors did not have their business cards. Then there was the presentation of the projects. "There was a couple of strong projects, but mostly the participants were poorly argued their participation in the Blockchain project just claiming that it would be a worldwide distributed system that would automate all the process." - says Almir Salimov.

Author: Dominika_Koks
Title: [ANN] SRG COMMUNITY - THE FIRST CRYPTO LOYALTY PROGRAM FOR ONLINE GAMING 🎮
Body: The SRG Community is the 1st decentralized intra-gaming platform based on the referral system using the Ethereum smart contract.  The referral system is the form of business cooperation between the owner of the Internet project (or seller) and the logged on user (partner) withthe aim of obtaining mutual benefits by selling of any goods or services. This system helps the seller to reduce the cost for attracting customers.  We have multi-level referral program. There are two kinds of referal programs - single-level and multi-level.Single-level program has three participants: the project, partner and referral. You, as a partner, invited referral, he bought something and you received benefits. If he invited someone else, and he purchased the goods, you wouldn’t be awarded. In multi-level referal system there can be two and more referral levels. It means that you receive benefits for those whom you invited, and for those who were invited by your referrals.  Why is this system so popular?  The aim of using this system is to expand the horizons of the website.The participants invite new members, and those in turn invite others to receive benefits. And in this way the information of the website quickly and efficiently spreads to the Internet. Active participants of the referral system, who know where and how to get the necessary amount of visitors, earn a lot of benefits.

And convincing please do not advertise your project on our topic.  If you mean a common goal (community of players) is the common goal of any online project related to the game industry, whether gamecredits, skincoin or GAMECASH. But the way to achieve the goal of each project, for example: mobilego to build its gaming market and want to attract developers here, dmarket creates a platform for the sale and exchange of skins. Our team realizes the set goal through the monetization of viral marketing and the construction of an international decentralized loyalty program, this concept has not been used so far, this is our highlight. Title: [ANN] SRG COMMUNITY - THE FIRST CRYPTO LOYALTY PROGRAM FOR ONLINE GAMING 🎮
Body: Good afternoon, representatives of GAMECASH. I earnestly request that before issuing loud statements to SRG Limeted, I ask you to initially study the company's internal logistics system for its foundation and development, which were patented on the basis of a legal agreement. If you disagree with something and think that (you are copied), then you can strain a request for legal advice and will discuss our interactions in court. Introductory information for referral: Our company is registered since 2016 SRG Limited, Road town 223, Tortola, BVI. The company has a patented modular part of the project, in addition, there are developments since 2015 that have been verified by the relevant executive bodies. The system and media plan has been developed with ambisafe and there are contractual and media developments that have been developed in the future, until your publication. The fact that our concepts are similar, in this we completely agree, as well as skincoin and dmarmet, or polibius and chromo bank. We only wish you good luck in conducting the ICO of the company, and we do not consider you competitors or enemies.  And do not spam in our topic  Thank you for understanding!

Title: [ANN] SRG COMMUNITY - THE FIRST CRYPTO LOYALTY PROGRAM FOR ONLINE GAMING 🎮
Body: A lot of well-known streamers and bloggers will definitely get a huge cut from this especially when they play new games with a trading/in-app purchase element. Now, I'm wondering which genre and what exact games will you be targeting as your initial games? This will be important because a bigger player base = more referrals, and an active in-game market would make your coins more attractive, and incentivize players to rope more people in.  Another concern I have is, what's unique in your concept that prevents a publisher from replicating your concept for their own games?  But an interesting concept nonetheless and will be watching out for it!
